definitions.definition: A relationship between several quantities which can be considered as proportional and expressed in terms of linear algebra , or any mathematical property of a relationship, operation or function that is analogous to such proportionality , satisfying additivity and homogeneity .

secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) A relationship between several quantities which can be considered as proportional and expressed in terms of linear algebra , or any mathematical property of a relationship, operation or function that is analogous to such proportionality , satisfying additivity and homogeneity .
